resources.string: We are determined to introduce newbies and oldies interested in Android development to the framework. We hope to build a budding community of world class android developers who can take on real world projects One step at a time, we seek to mentor, train and guide budding android developers on their journey, and have fun while at it
My name is TAOFEEQ MUSA. I am a citizen of Nigeria and a participant (beginner in KOTLIN LANGUAGE) in the ongoing DROIDCAMP android development program for aspiring android developers .

Khadijat is someone very passionate about change in her environment. She continually improves herself by not only pursuing her interests but also submitting herself to change. She loves cycling, interested in artificial intelligence, art in general(drawing and writing inclusive,loves cycling and is committed to growth. In years to come, Khadijat want to see more individuals venturing into technology. She hopes with the opportunity given to her, not only would she have grown so much as a developer but as an innovative member of the society.

I am a newbie to Android development. I am very enthusiastic about creating tech-based solutions for my community. I am determined, self motivated, curious, and have great thirst for knowledge. I am brave, I am bruised, I am who am meant to be, THIS IS ME. ~The Greatest Showman.

DroidCamp 2.0 student
 Aspiring Mobile App Developer
 Positive thinker
 I am cool/calm and learn from people.
 Love to solve world problem with technology.

My name is Oscar I am new to android development. I am passionate about learning mobile development. I hope to be a great developer one day. I am tech savvy, and easy going.When am not learning to code i am either sleeping or seeing movies at leisure

Hey there, I\'m Emu. An Android developer and DroidCamp student looking to hone my skills and become a professional Android Developer. I\'m excited to be here and looking to have fun on this journey Vamos!
I am determined new Android developer. I am Start-Up Tech business owner in Abuja Nigeria
Nadia is an energetic young woman aspiring to become a developer
